bibl.title: Ancient Scholarship and Grammar. Archetypes, Concepts and Contexts.
bibl.note: The volume springs in part from the colloquium entitled Ancient Scholarship and Grammar, organized in Thessaloniki in 2008. 26 contributions. - Pp. 1-8: Introduction (S.M., Fr.M. and A.R.); - 527-562: Bibliography; - 563-572: General Index; - 573-592: Passages Index.
bibl.seg: Matthaios Stephanos, Franco Montanari and Antonios Rengakos (Edd.), Ancient Scholarship and Grammar. Archetypes, Concepts and Contexts. (Trends in Classics. Supplementary Volumes. 8.)
Berlin - New York, de Gruyter, 2011, 8Â°, viii-592 pp. ISBN 978-3-11-025403-7. $182.

The volume springs in part from the colloquium entitled Ancient Scholarship and Grammar, organized in Thessaloniki in 2008. 26 contributions. - Pp. 1-8: Introduction (S.M., Fr.M. and A.R.); - 527-562: Bibliography; - 563-572: General Index; - 573-592: Passages Index.
